description: This is a test file for the React application, specifically an integration test suite for the App component. It mocks API utilities, simulates user interactions such as login, task creation, completion, and deletion, and verifies application behaviors.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for App integration tests.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for specific app behaviors like login, task creation, completion, deletion, and failed login handling.
